name: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly
synopsis: Terror returns with Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly, the sequel to the highly popular survival horror title, Fatal Frame.  This time the terrifying journey takes you to a whole new creepy setting, an abandoned village, where you play the role of Mio Amakura, a young girl who is gifted with a strong sixth sense and her twin sister Mayu, who notices a crimson butterfly faintly glowing in the sky.  Your only weapon, an antique camera, has received a variety of new features to kill ghosts.  Get lost in another horrifying tale.
